word_mean: 变异，转变：指形态、性质及其他某些特征的改变
突变：在遗传学上，指遗传物质的永久性、可遗传性改变，通常发生在某单个基因上。因而个体也可表现出这种改变
遗传物质的结构或成分发生突然变化的现象。
基因的结构发生改变而导致细胞、病毒或微生物的基因型发生稳定的、可遗传的变化的过程。

sentence.Network_en: Scientists have found a genetic mutation that appears to be the cause of Huntington's disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学家们已经发现了一种可能是引起亨廷顿舞蹈病的基因变异。

sentence.Network_en: This mutation makes it better adapted than the other four.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种变异使它具有比其他四只猪为大的适应能力.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin mutatio(n-), from mutare 'to change'

entry.def: If an animal or plant mutates, or something mutates it, it develops different characteristics as the result of a change in its genes.

example.ex: The virus mutates in the carrier's body...
example.tran: 病毒会在携带者体内发生变异。

example.ex: A newer anti-HIV drug called pyridinone caused HIV to mutate into a form which could not reproduce or infect new cells...
example.tran: 一种叫作吡啶酮的新型抗艾滋病药物能促使艾滋病毒变异，使其不能繁殖，也不会再感染新的细胞。

entry.def: If something mutates into something different, it changes into that thing.

example.ex: Overnight, the gossip begins to mutate into headlines.
example.tran: 一夜之间，传闻变成了报纸的头条新闻。

means.word_mean: 1. (biology) an organism that has characteristics resulting from chromosomal alteration
2. (genetics) any event that changes genetic structure; any alteration in the inherited nucleic acid sequence of the genotype of an organism
3. a change or alteration in form or qualities

auth_sentence.content: Nature has changed through mutation "slow" life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nature has changed through mutation "slow" life.

auth_sentence.content: More convincing yet are radiation mutation studies on rhodents.
auth_sentence.res_content: More convincing yet are radiation mutation studies on rhodents.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: More convincing yet are radiation mutation studies on rhodents.

auth_sentence.content: Supposedly evolution occurs by natural selection after random mutation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Supposedly evolution occurs by natural selection after random mutation.

means.word_mean: （形式或结构的）转变, 改变 变化;（生物物种的）突变, 变异, 变种; 突变体

sentences.en: The result of these experiments will be a nightmarish world filled with two-headed monsters and other mutants.
sentences.cn: 这些试验的结果将造成一个可怕的世界,充满了双头怪和其他怪物。
